Text:
Hoping this is a repack or fresh source. If there's a problem with this copy as well, i'll post in a heads-up

Either way, thx TvTeam... Appreciate the effort regardless!

Ok, i can't sit down and watch it all the way through until later tonight, but i watched the first couple of minutes for testing purposes and all seems well. No immediate glitchiness like was reported with the 400-something MB TvTeam copy. 

If when i watch it later a glitch is discovered, i'll come back and note it here. 

Thx again, TvTeam
